description_for_human: Search domain availability, get AI-powered name suggestions, compare prices, and check social handles.
description_for_model:
Domain search and availability checking tool. Use this to:
- Check if domains are available (search_domain, bulk_search)
- Get AI-powered domain name suggestions (suggest_domains_smart)
- Compare prices across registrars (compare_registrars)
- Check social media handle availability (check_socials)
- Analyze projects for domain ideas (analyze_project)
- Find expiring domains (expiring_domains)
- Hunt valuable domains (hunt_domains)
- Get TLD information (tld_info)
